item.description:
Uptown Swing is a monthly Saturday night dance featuring a different band each month. The dance is held at Brookline Tai Chi, a beautiful space with a great floor, AC and a convenient location directly across from the Washington Square T stop on Beacon Street. There is free street parking after 8:00pm.

Beginners are very welcome and there is a lesson included at the beginning of the evening to get everyone started. You do not need to have a partner to attend. The music will be excellent for Lindy Hop, Swing, Balboa and even some Blues. Bring your friends and introduce them to a fun night of dancing!

 

The dance Saturday, August 20 with The Love Dogs! Lesson runs from 8:15-9:00pm, dance from 9:00pm to midnight. Door admission is $15, $10 with student I.D.

http://www.hoptothebeat.com/uptown-swing-dance

group.name: The Boston-Area Swing/Blues Dance Meetup Group

item.name: Uptown Swing Dance
